StillHere: ^Camilla: For now, but think of all those we've lost. All the freaks and beauties lost, bleeding on the edge. The scene has shrunk to half the size it was a year and a half ago.
StillHere2: ^Camilla: People die, or they uninstall. I went to the MEDicil clinic, and they recommended I go for uninstallation. I can't imagine it, but what choice do I have?
DidNotKnow: ^Camilla: But I knew who was getting it. It wasn't just anybody, it was us. The dancers, singers, artists, freaks and beauties on the edge.
DidNotKnow2: ^Camilla: I went to the MEDicil clinic, and they were talking about uninstallation. I can't imagine it, but what choice do I have?
GladHelp: ^Camilla: You're still one of the only mechanics who'll see us. I know Joselito is going to the clinic at MEDicil, but they don't really treat him. Just do tests on him. I only went once, they kept talking about uninstallation.
Relief: ^Camilla: Maybe for a day or two, used to be a week or so, but I guess we can only fight so long. I tried the clinic at MEDicil, they didn't help.
Relief2: ^Camilla: I only went once, but they kept talking about uninstallation. At the very least you get that that's not an option.
StillDidChoices: ^You wouldn't be yourself without your tail!
^I think you have to consider every possibility.
WithoutTail: ^Camilla: Yeah.. My old life only comes back to me in fits and starts, but when I move my tail? It does feel like home. It's hard to accept your only option is to fight, especially after fighting so so long. I'll probably be seeing you soon.
EveryPossibility: ^Camilla: I guess I do. Can't imagine it. God, maybe I do.
